titleStmt.title: An Account of the confession and execution of Captain Vratz, Geo. Boraski, and John Sterne, who were this present Friday, being the tenth of March, executed at Pell-mall for the barbarous murther of Thomas Thynne, Esquire together with a particular relation of their behaviour in Newgate since their condemnation, and manner of their passing to the place of execution.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in British Library.
